General.Name: Homeland Safety International Inc
General.Description: Homeland Safety International, Inc. engages in the manufacture and marketing of bomb detection devices. The company was incorporated as Sniffex, Inc. in 2004 and changed its name to Homeland Safety International, Inc. in 2006. Homeland Safety International is based in Irving, Texas.
General.Address: 5215 North O'Connor Boulevard, Irving, TX, United States, 75039
